direct_sum_right_tmul_lof:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊗ₜ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊗ₜ[ ] » -/
@[simp]
theorem direct_sum_right_tmul_lof (x : M₁') (i : ι₂) (y : M₂ i) :
    directSumRight R M₁' M₂ («expr ⊗ₜ[ ] » x R (DirectSum.lof R _ _ i y)) =
      DirectSum.lof R _ _ i («expr ⊗ₜ[ ] » x R y) :=
  by
  dsimp only [direct_sum_right, LinearEquiv.trans_apply, TensorProduct.comm_tmul]
  rw [direct_sum_left_tmul_lof]
  exact Dfinsupp.mapRange_single
#align direct_sum_right_tmul_lof direct_sum_right_tmul_lof
direct_sum_right_symm_lof_tmul:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊗ₜ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊗ₜ[ ] » -/
@[simp]
theorem direct_sum_right_symm_lof_tmul (x : M₁') (i : ι₂) (y : M₂ i) :
    (directSumRight R M₁' M₂).symm (DirectSum.lof R _ _ i («expr ⊗ₜ[ ] » x R y)) =
      «expr ⊗ₜ[ ] » x R (DirectSum.lof R _ _ i y) :=
  by rw [LinearEquiv.symm_apply_eq, direct_sum_right_tmul_lof]
#align direct_sum_right_symm_lof_tmul direct_sum_right_symm_lof_tmul
direct_sum_lof_tmul_lof:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊗ₜ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `tensor_product -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊗ₜ » -/
/-

@[simp]
theorem direct_sum_lof_tmul_lof (i₁ : ι₁) (m₁ : M₁ i₁) (i₂ : ι₂) (m₂ : M₂ i₂) :
    TensorProduct.directSum R M₁ M₂ («expr ⊗ₜ » (DirectSum.lof R ι₁ M₁ i₁ m₁) (DirectSum.lof R ι₂ M₂ i₂ m₂)) =
      DirectSum.lof R (ι₁ × ι₂) (fun i => tensor_product (M₁ i.1) R (M₂ i.2)) (i₁, i₂) («expr ⊗ₜ » m₁ m₂) :=
  by simp [TensorProduct.directSum]
#align direct_sum_lof_tmul_lof direct_sum_lof_tmul_lof
direct_sum_left_tmul_lof:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊗ₜ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊗ₜ[ ] » -/
@[simp]
theorem direct_sum_left_tmul_lof (i : ι₁) (x : M₁ i) (y : M₂') :
    directSumLeft R M₁ M₂' («expr ⊗ₜ[ ] » (DirectSum.lof R _ _ i x) R y) =
      DirectSum.lof R _ _ i («expr ⊗ₜ[ ] » x R y) :=
  by
  dsimp only [direct_sum_left, LinearEquiv.ofLinear_apply, lift.tmul]
  rw [DirectSum.toModule_lof R i]
  rfl
#align direct_sum_left_tmul_lof direct_sum_left_tmul_lof
direct_sum_left_symm_lof_tmul:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊗ₜ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊗ₜ[ ] » -/
@[simp]
theorem direct_sum_left_symm_lof_tmul (i : ι₁) (x : M₁ i) (y : M₂') :
    (directSumLeft R M₁ M₂').symm (DirectSum.lof R _ _ i («expr ⊗ₜ[ ] » x R y)) =
      «expr ⊗ₜ[ ] » (DirectSum.lof R _ _ i x) R y :=
  by rw [LinearEquiv.symm_apply_eq, direct_sum_left_tmul_lof]
#align direct_sum_left_symm_lof_tmul direct_sum_left_symm_lof_tmul
